synopsis.text:
So aked in the dream of a school life brimming with cuteness, Eruna Ichinomiya finds herself enrolled in Mikagura Private School, captivated by the allure of its charming uniforms. Little does she know, this seemingly idyllic institution harbors a unique and intense club culture, where representatives from each club engage in fierce battles using extraordinary powers. In this high-stakes game, club rankings dictate the quality of life for its members, from their meals to their accommodations.

Eruna, with her heart set on the enigmatic Seisa Mikagura, joins the going-home club, only to be thrust into the whirlwind of inter-club battles. As she navigates through the labyrinth of cultural clubs, she assists the members with their personal struggles while vying for the top spot in school. Amidst the chaos, Eruna must find her footing and harness her unique abilities to survive and thrive in this unconventional high school experience. Will she rise to the challenge and claim victory for her club? Only time will tell in this thrilling, high-energy adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
